title: 3 ingredient parsing golden file test failures
description: test_ingredient_parsing_golden_files has 3 failures across 5670 tests. The failing recipes are: pipeline/japanesecooking101--hayashi-rice-recipe, pipeline/tasty-co--recipe-slow-cooker-ribs, and pipeline/whiteonricecouple--lamingtons-recipe. Either the golden files need updating or the parser has regressed for these cases.
